<static> replace_material(obj_to, mat_to_name, obj_from, mat_from_name)

Dangerous method to replace batch material from another object. Only dynamic objects supported.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj_to Destination Object ID
mat_to_name Destination material name
obj_from Source Object ID
mat_from_name Source material name

<static> set_batch_param()

Dangerous method to set batch param

<static> set_diffuse_color(obj, mat_name, color)

Set diffuse color and alpha for object material. Only dynamic objects supported.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Object ID
mat_name Material name
color vec4 Color+alpha vector

<static> set_diffuse_intensity(obj, mat_name, intensity)

Set diffuse color intensity for object material. Only dynamic objects supported.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Object ID
mat_name Material name
intensity Number Diffuse intencity value
